==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|締|切}}

===Etymology===
From {{m|ja|締める|sc=Jpan}} (''shimeru'', "fasten," "lock," "shut") + {{m|ja|切る|sc=Jpan}} (''kiru'', "cut off by a partition")

===Pronunciation===
* {{IPA|/ɕi.me.ki.ri/|lang=ja}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|しめきり}}

# [[closing]] [[day]], [[deadline]]
# [[closed|Closed]], No Entrance

====Alternative forms====
* {{l|ja|締切}} is the most common form
* {{l|ja|締め切り}}: next most common
* {{l|ja|締切り}}
* {{l|ja|〆切}}
* {{l|ja|〆切り}}: least common

====Derived terms====
* {{l|ja|申込締切}} (''mōshikomi shimekiri''): application deadline
* {{l|ja|締切日}} (''shimekiribi''): time limit, closing day, deadline
